Name: Gooseberry
SeedDescription: Plant these in summer. Takes 13 days to mature, and keeps producing after the first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en verano. Toma 13 días para madurar, continua produciendo después de la primera cosecha.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 여름 작물. 성장하려면 13일이 소요되며, 수확한 후에도 계속 생산됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen sie im Sommer. Wächst in 13 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 夏植えの作物。そだつのに13日かかるが、そのあともくりかえし収穫できる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no verão. Demora 13 dias para amadurecer e continua produzindo após a primeira colheita.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 夏天播种。13天成熟，收获之后还能继续结果。
